title: Bridging the learning gap
creator_contributor_role: University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Study and teaching - Australia

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers - Training of
description: Discusses the use of small discussion groups as the main teaching medium in the University's Faculty of Law, and reasons for the adoption of the system. The role of the teacher in this teaching situation, and the extent to which objectives are being achieved are being evaluated by the T.E.R.C. Increasing student interest and involvement is apparent.
